name: Tooltip
body:
#**Tooltips** Tooltips is a simple tooltip *tool* (hehe) that skips the bullshit. Crafted with love using `JQuery` and `CSS`. It was designed with ease of use in mind. ## Just Get Started Already! It's super simple to start using *Tooltips*. Just add `data-tooltip="tooltip content"` to the element that you want to add the element to. ###Examples ```html

I gobble down a row of Double Stuf Golden Oreos and a peanut butter sandwich, all sloshed down with a pint of chocolate milk. Later in the afternoon I stop at Five Guys to devour a double bacon cheeseburger and a monster order of sodium-loaded fries. Finally, before going to bed, I knock off a bag of Philly Cheese Steak Rippled Potato Chips--dripping with onion dip.

``` ### Contributing Want to make a theme? Submit a pull-request with your theme! Found an issue? Create one [here](https://github.com/Un3qual/tooltip/issues)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
